column5: The last of my Bigugli's *plain nasty* salsa I acquired at the Hamilton Bassmasters swap is about to git in me belly. I've had it mixed with ground beef over pasta, cheesed up with nachos and atop foot long beef dogs......  All I can say is.....nasty, just "plain nasty," thanks Bruce. I'll be needing more next time we get together.
If you've never tried it you ain't lived yet! The only thing standing between that salsa and fortune is a good marketing plan!
My 2  jars were gone in a week.

My 2  jars were gone in a week.   If I recall you had the "Oh My," awesome stuff for sure. My in and out have to be treated cautiously with the *Plain Nasty!" My heart and mind are all in......just need to be careful......lol
Bigugli's plain nasty salsa on Dragon's Den.  Now, that's a fire!
If you've never tried it you ain't lived yet! The only thing standing between that salsa and fortune is a good marketing plan! The only problem would be losing what's left of my fishing time.
I'll take 25 jars next year. Just remind me in September
